/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades painted in a variety of colors including red, white, and gray, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the colorful buildings. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of looking up at the cityscape.
